螴字的基本解释

螴
chén
〔螴蜳（
d憂 ）〕a.不安定，如“有甚忧两陷而无所逃，螴螴不得成，心若悬于天地之间。”b.虫行。

螴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chén］
［《集韻》池鄰切，平真，澄。］
见“螴蜳”。

螴字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螴； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1095第05
【集韻】池鄰切，音陳。螴蜳。詳蜳字註。　又丑刃切，音趂。義同。

螴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
螴字的起名意思

暂无。

Chrysanthemum
Basic explanation of words
Chrysanthemum
chén
〔螴蜳(
d worry )] a. Unstable, such as "There is nothing to escape from both worries, the chicks cannot succeed, and the heart hangs between the heaven and the earth." b. Insect movement.
Chrysanthemum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chén］
["Ji Yun" Chi is next to each other, plain and clear. ]
See "Tartus".
Chrysanthemum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螴; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1095 No. 05
[Ji Yun] Chi neighboring cut, sound Chen. Chrysanthemum. Detailed note of the word.　The ugly blade cut again, the sound took advantage of it. The same meaning.
